article.title: GET /
article.description: Gets information about a server (a Sync Gateway instance)

introduction.paragraph: This call returns a JSON object that contains information about the server, that is, about the Sync Gateway instance.

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.

topic.title: Response
topic.body:
Status codes
200 OK – Request completed successfully 404 Not Found – Requested session not found ß
Response headers
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
Message body
The message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects:
Name Type Description
authentication_handlers array List of supported authentication handlers
ok Boolean Success flag
userCtx Object Contains an object with properties channels (the list of channels for the user associated with the session) and name (the user associated with the session)

body.paragraph: The following example retrieves information for a session in database named cookbook.
The following example shows the response returned when you request information about a session that does not exist on the server. The example requests information about a non-existent session id.
body.code-block:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Content-Length: 40 Content-Type: application/json Date: Thu, 06 Nov 2014 00:30:09 GMT Server: Couchbase Sync Gateway/unofficial
{ "error": "not_found", "reason": "missing" }
